updates.details: Identified cause and working to resolve as quick as possible.
Although services came back up temporarily after the maintenance intervention, a further issue is currently preventing normal operation and is under investigation.
Intervention and repair planned between Mon 26 Feb - Wed 28 Feb during which time tape services will be unvailable.
The next scheduled maintenance day (aka Patch Day) is provisionally scheduled for 16 April 2024. Further updates to follow nearer the date.
